Who We Help

“I was jobless, without benefits. I used up my life savings just to get through everything.”

Donate

The Facts

  • 1 in 8 Canadian women will develop breast cancer during her lifetime.
  • 72 Canadian women will be diagnosed daily with breast cancer.
  • Breast cancer accounts for 13% off all cancers and 25% of cancers among females.
  • Mother, daughter, sister, partner, wife; this is who we help.

Wings of Hope

Wings of Hope funds programs to help ease financial burdens and promote wellness for low-income people who are living with breast cancer in and around Calgary.
